Text: Originally it was french. contains many languages, I switched it to english
hey, why you don't compress to .cso and ziped to reduce the file size

I have CFW 5.50 Prometheus, and the game won't start up. The screen goes black and my system shuts off after ~10 seconds. 

Any idea why this is happening?

@ presidentgames - iso is the standard psp game format. If you have a psp, custom firmware it and throw the iso file in the ISO folder on the root of your mem-stick.
And TY Truenthr - glad u didnt cso this, i prefer my games at best possible quality. If you really want it smaller in filesize, just get ISOTOOL and cso it yourself!!!... :)
